text.content: Thanks for meeting me! Did you have any trouble finding the place? It's not on most maps.
Shall we head upstairs? I've rented a room for the night.
Do you remember that spell I cast at our game?
I've been doing some research into it. LOTS of research, actually. There's a rather large number of books on the subject in the library.
Which shouldn't surprise anyone, I guess. Boarding school full of teenagers? I'm surprised there's not house orgies!
...Wait, there AREN'T house orgies, are there?
Anyway! I've found a particularly promising formula.
It's a potion which will heighten pleasure by a factor of ten. TEN! Can you imagine?
You have no idea how badly I want to brew this! But sadly, I'm missing an ingredient. It's not something I can buy. And I can't ask Harry or Ron to help.
And, um, that's where you come in.
You see... well... I'll just come out and say it, shall I?
I need 'the juices of two witches, mingled together'.
So... I was thinking... if you promise to help me gather the ingredients, I'll happily test the potion with you. Does that seem fair?
